TextView.android:text: INTERVIEWER: I would like to speak with the head of household or another adult household member. First, please allow me to ask you about the individuals in your household. Starting with the head of household, please give me the name, sex, and relationship with the head of household of each individual in your household.\nJust to make sure that I have a complete listing: are there any other people such as small children or infants born in the past year that we have not listed?
What is relationship with household head

What is age in 
days (1 to 59 days)/ 
months (2 to 59 month)/ 
years (greater or equal 5 years)?
Mothers ID (IF MOTHER IS A HOUSEHOLD MEMBER)
Fathers ID (IF FATHER IS A HOUSEHOLD MEMBER)
What level of education have you completed?
What is primary income generating activity (main occupation) at this time?
Currently pregnant or had a pregnancy that ended in the last one year
Has pregnant woman registered for antenatal care(ANC)?
Which health facility does pregnant woman attend?
